alert.note: Alert for Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 1:24PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Citrus, northern Sumter and north central Hernando Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 123 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Inverness Airport, or near Inverness, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Inverness, Wildwood, Bushnell, Homosassa Springs, Inverness Airport, Inverness Highlands South, North Brooksville, Inverness Highlands North, Sugarmill Woods, Lake Panasoffkee, Coleman, Lake Lindsey, Leisure Acres, Inverness Highlands, Adamsville, Sumterville, Heatherwood, Gospel Island, Floral City and Oxford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
